name: Wacky Warrior
description:
Welcome to  Wacky Warrior, our entry to the ScoreJam! This is our secon game and gamejam!

Controls:

WASD to move

If you have a power prese left click to use it

Space bar to absorb/dash enemies (2s cooldown) 

You are a wacky slime trying to survive, absorb your enemies by pressing space to get their weapons. The more you kill and the longer you don't get hit,  more points you will gain. Good luck!
